item.description:
This Month's Girl's Night:

1. Date: Saturday, May 14th at 5pm
2. Location: Andrea's House in Portland
3. Host: Andrea
4. Theme: Tarot Cards, Astrology, and Mysteries of the Universe

This Girl's Night will involve tarot cards, astrology, and various mysteries of the universe! Please dress up as your astrological sign or as a star. For example, if you're a Leo you can dress up as a lion or if you're a pisces you can dress up as a fish. Please also print and bring a description of your sign with you. You may find descriptions of each sign here:

http://www.astrologycom.com/starsign.html

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment when you RSVP. It doesn't have to match your sign, I just tried to find something to coordinate with each astrological sign:

1. Aries (Fire Sign) - Stuffed Peppers
2. Taurus (Earth Sign) - Fresh Fruits
3. Gemini (Air Sign) - Light & Fluffy Biscuits with Butter
4. Cancer (Water Sign) - Soda & Juice
5. Leo (Fire Sign) - Salsa, Cheese Dip, & Chips
6. Virgo (Earth Sign) - Spinach & Artichoke Dip & Bread
7. Libra (Air Sign) - An appetizer of your choosing
8. Scorpio (Water Sign) - 2 Bottles of Champagne
9. Saggitarius (Fire Sign) - Jalapeno Poppers
10. Capricorn (Earth Sign) - Regular House Salad with a vinaigrette dressing on the side

11. Aquarius (Air Sign) - An appetizer of your choosing
12. Pisces (Water Sign) - Ice Cream
13. Paper Stars to decorate with
14. A Prize for the best costume (I recommend picking out something YOU would want to win, maybe a $10 gift certificate to a restaurant or something)
15. Cheese & Crackers
16. Name tags & a guest book (We're going to start keeping a guest book for each girl's night after JoAnne's wonderful idea)
17. Tarot Cards and a description of what they mean/are/etc
18. A dessert of your choice
19. An dessert of your choice
20. A themed item of your choice

I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Andrea will be answering the door
item.name: Girls Night! Tarot Cards, Astrology, and Mysteries of the Universe Theme
